column4: anyone know why my external harddrive wont appear on my desktop when i plug it in?
lsusb what does that output for you
unplug it, then tail -f /var/log/messages and plug it back in
i cant help you, you've gotten farther with your ext hdd than i have :P mine's being detect as keyboard/mouse
yours is being detected as storage device
/dev/sdb is your hard drive, you just have to mount it
sudo fdisk -l, what does that output? and thats an L
so your booting ubuntu off of that ext hdd?
oh, ya im reading sda, so ya you need to mount sdb and you should be good, but it should auto mount for you, you'll need to add a line in /etc/fstab to mount on boot
